Articles.Content:
Inspired by a previous mostly failed spaceplane design that began to glide, land, and take off again in atmo, all after it ran out of fuel, I decided to mess around in the editor to see if I could make a glider. This somehow led to me making this, quite possibly the simplest plane ever:

And yes, it flies, and is quite controllable, if sluggish. Stupidly fast too. Also, not a glider.

I'm using same plane starting from 0.15

It doesn't even need any control surfaces, it's so small that rotating force of a cockpit is enough.

Very easy to use and land with trimming (Alt+WASD)

It's actually pretty good scouting plane.

Edited May 14, 2013 by koshelenkovv
